16  
17  package org.springframework.core.env;
18  
19  import java.util.List;
20  
21  import org.junit.Test;
22  
23  import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.*;
24  import static org.junit.Assert.*;
25  
26  /**
27   * Unit tests for {@link SimpleCommandLinePropertySource}.
28   *
29   * @author Chris Beams
30   * @since 3.1
31   */
32  public class SimpleCommandLinePropertySourceTests {
33  
34  	@Test
35  	public void withDefaultName() {
36  		PropertySource<?> ps = new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource();
37  		assertThat(ps.getName(),
38  				equalTo(CommandLinePropertySource.COMMAND_LINE_PROPERTY_SOURCE_NAME));
39  	}
40  
41  	@Test
42  	public void withCustomName() {
43  		PropertySource<?> ps = new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("ps1", new String[0]);
44  		assertThat(ps.getName(), equalTo("ps1"));
45  	}
46  
47  	@Test
48  	public void withNoArgs() {
49  		PropertySource<?> ps = new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource();
50  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("foo"), is(false));
51  		assertThat(ps.getProperty("foo"), nullValue());
52  	}
53  
54  	@Test
55  	public void withOptionArgsOnly() {
56  		CommandLinePropertySource<?> ps =
57  			new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("--o1=v1", "--o2");
58  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o1"), is(true));
59  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o2"), is(true));
60  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o3"), is(false));
61  		assertThat(ps.getProperty("o1"), equalTo("v1"));
62  		assertThat(ps.getProperty("o2"), equalTo(""));
63  		assertThat(ps.getProperty("o3"), nullValue());
64  	}
65  
66  	@Test
67  	public void withDefaultNonOptionArgsNameAndNoNonOptionArgsPresent() {
68  		EnumerablePropertySource<?> ps = new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("--o1=v1", "--o2");
69  
70  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("nonOptionArgs"), is(false));
71  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o1"), is(true));
72  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o2"), is(true));
73  
74  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("nonOptionArgs"), is(false));
75  		assertThat(ps.getProperty("nonOptionArgs"), nullValue());
76  		assertThat(ps.getPropertyNames().length, is(2));
77  	}
78  
79  	@Test
80  	public void withDefaultNonOptionArgsNameAndNonOptionArgsPresent() {
81  		CommandLinePropertySource<?> ps =
82  			new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("--o1=v1", "noa1", "--o2", "noa2");
83  
84  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("nonOptionArgs"), is(true));
85  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o1"), is(true));
86  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o2"), is(true));
87  
88  		String nonOptionArgs = ps.getProperty("nonOptionArgs");
89  		assertThat(nonOptionArgs, equalTo("noa1,noa2"));
90  	}
91  
92  	@Test
93  	public void withCustomNonOptionArgsNameAndNoNonOptionArgsPresent() {
94  		CommandLinePropertySource<?> ps =
95  			new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("--o1=v1", "noa1", "--o2", "noa2");
96  		ps.setNonOptionArgsPropertyName("NOA");
97  
98  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("nonOptionArgs"), is(false));
99  		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("NOA"), is(true));
100 		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o1"), is(true));
101 		assertThat(ps.containsProperty("o2"), is(true));
102 		String nonOptionArgs = ps.getProperty("NOA");
103 		assertThat(nonOptionArgs, equalTo("noa1,noa2"));
104 	}
105 
106 	@Test
107 	public void covertNonOptionArgsToStringArrayAndList() {
108 		CommandLinePropertySource<?> ps =
109 			new SimpleCommandLinePropertySource("--o1=v1", "noa1", "--o2", "noa2");
110 		StandardEnvironment env = new StandardEnvironment();
111 		env.getPropertySources().addFirst(ps);
112 
113 		String nonOptionArgs = env.getProperty("nonOptionArgs");
114 		assertThat(nonOptionArgs, equalTo("noa1,noa2"));
115 
116 		String[] nonOptionArgsArray = env.getProperty("nonOptionArgs", String[].class);
117 		assertThat(nonOptionArgsArray[0], equalTo("noa1"));
118 		assertThat(nonOptionArgsArray[1], equalTo("noa2"));
119 
120 		@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
121 		List<String> nonOptionArgsList = env.getProperty("nonOptionArgs", List.class);
122 		assertThat(nonOptionArgsList.get(0), equalTo("noa1"));
123 		assertThat(nonOptionArgsList.get(1), equalTo("noa2"));
124 	}
125 }
